title: The Ye Of It All, Goth Batman 3.04.22
itunes:title: The Ye Of It All, Goth Batman 3.04.22
description:
In episode 1097, Jack and guest co-host Joelle Monique are joined by author, writer, and podcaster Alison Rosen to discuss Jan 6th Case Might Be Best Shot At Keeping Trump Out Of Office, The Two Fronts of the War–Bombing and Economics– Both Having Major Impact, The Kanye of It All, WHAT’S MAKING YOU HAPPY!? and more!

  1. Jan 6th Case Might Be Best Shot At Keeping Trump Out Of Office
  2. The Two Fronts of the War–Bombing and Economics– Both Having Major Impact
  3. UN General Assembly Demands Russia Withdraw From Ukraine


LISTEN: Underwaterfall by Bearcubs

Podcasts| Alison Rosen Is Your New Best Friend |Childish With Greg Fitzsimmons & Alison Rosen |Upworthy Weekly
